title: How are live performances shot? - Quora

response.answer_text: Multiple cameras. Wether edited later or switched on a live view board there’s many cameras and cameramen/women out there shooting footage. I was recently at a Garth Brooks concert and they were shooting footage for a documentary to be done on A&e. It was neat to see that part happening but odd funny because all the camera operators were wearing all black outfits so they were not to be seen in the shots or edited footage.
